Package jdbc

package jdbc
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DataBaseAreaManagerController
    The DataBaseAreaManagerController class appears to be responsible for retrieving information about an Area Manager from a database, specifically their details and the facilities in their area.
    DataBaseController
    The DataBaseController class appears to be responsible for creating and managing a connection to a MySQL database
    DataBaseOpreatingWorker
    DataBaseOpreatingWorker, in this class we will perform several queries in order to: Update execution instruction.
    DataBaseOrderController
     
    DataBasePickUpOrderController
    This Class makes use of a database and searches for a customer whether his order exists and whether it is correct for the facility where he is.
    DataBaseReportController
    Controller to deal with reports .
    DataBaseSalesController
    DataBaseSalesController is a class that is responsible for sales, The sales are handled by the marketing manager and the marketing worker.
    DataBaseTransferExecutionInstructionsController
    DataBase Transfer Execution Instructions Controller In this class, queries will be made for the inventory update request process Queries: Get all operations workers from the database.

    Controller to deal with user's details .
